// sample prb - http://www.codechef.com/problems/REN2013G

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define N 1000000
using namespace std;
int arr[1004][1004] = {0}, xind[1004]={0} , yind[1004]={0} , vis[1004]={0} , dist[1004]={0};
set < pair<int,int> >q;
int main()
{
	int n,i,j,x1,sum,v,dv;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&xind[i],&yind[i]);
	}
	scanf("%d%d",&xind[i],&yind[i]);
	xind[0]=yind[0]=0;
	for(i=0;i<=n+1;i++)
	{
		for(j=i+1;j<=n+1;j++)
		{
			x1 = (xind[j]-xind[i]);
			sum = x1*x1;
			x1 = (yind[j]-yind[i]);
			sum+= x1*x1;
			arr[i][j] = sum;
			arr[j][i] = sum; 
		}
	}
	q.insert(make_pair(0,0));
	memset(dist,N,sizeof(dist));
	dist[0]=0;
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		v = q.begin()->second;
		dv = q.begin()->first;
		q.erase(q.begin());

		if(vis[v]==1)
			continue;
		vis[v]=1;
		for(i=0;i<=n+1;i++)
		{
			if(i!=v&&vis[i]==0)
			{
				if(dist[i] > dist[v] + arr[v][i])
				{
					dist[i] = dist[v] + arr[v][i];
					q.insert(make_pair(dist[i],i));
				}
			}
		}
	}
	printf("%d\n",dist[n+1]);
	return 0;
}
